dp:metadata.dc:title: Forever
dp:metadata.dc:creator: Deveraux, Jude
dp:metadata.dc:description: Wealthy Adam Montgomery has no recollection of how, at age 3, he acquired a terrible scar on his chest...or how his parents disappeared. A psychic told him that a young woman with certain "powers" will unlock the door to his past. But when she says that Darci T. Monroe is "the one," Adam is skeptical. It's hard to believe the petite, unsophisticated and strangely gifted Darci could stand up to a strong wind, let alone the evil they must confront. For there are witches in a small town in Connecticut who know exactly what happened to Adam as child...a coven suspected of murdering young women. And now Adam is faced with a dilemna. How can he place Darci in harm's way when he's falling in love with her?
